structure.unit: B FERTILIZER AND PESTICIDE USE AND APPLICATION

law.text: Each dealer shall be responsible for the actions of every person who acts as his employee or agent in the solicitation or sale of restricted use pesticides, and in all claims and recommendations for use or application of restricted use pesticides.
law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 172, sec. 10, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 148, sec. 25.
